events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to request a refund because the product didn’t meet my expectations and I no longer need it.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request based on the customer's mention of money back and dissatisfaction with the product.
Support agent Sarah Johnson has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer regarding their recent order.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, could you also confirm the reason you want to return the product and if you still have the original packaging?
My order number is 45892137. The product didn’t match the description on the website, and unfortunately, I’ve already opened the package.
Thank you for the details. We can proceed with the refund despite the opened package. Please ship the item back within 7 days, and we’ll refund the full amount once received.
Thanks for accommodating my request. I’ll send the product back today and expect to receive confirmation of the refund soon.
We have received your return shipment and processed the full refund. You should see the amount reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure your refund was received and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
As there have been no further questions, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
